subject: RE: [junit] writing MultiThreaded test cases using Junit
msgSnippet: Hi Srini, I suppose JUnit Perf should solve your problem. Check it on following URL http://www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html Regards Pragnesh ... From:

Hi Srini,

I suppose JUnit Perf should solve your problem. Check it on following URL

-----Original Message-----
From: schennamaraja [mailto:schennamaraja@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 27, 2002 1:17 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] writing MultiThreaded test cases using Junit


Hi!
I need to write a test case where I need to spun off different
threads to test one of my classes to test the thread safety of that
class. I was wondering how do I do that using junit.

I would appreciate your feedback...

thanks
Srini
